pr_title: SONARJAVA-3459 Only check for words in comments rather than any occurence

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3459 Only check for words in comments rather than any occurence

timeline.bodyText: The \\s is redundant here. \\W already matches everything matched by \\s. So this can just be "\\W+"
